product.title: Belette Hell
product.description: Belette Hell is an asymmetrical 2-player versus game. One player is on PC and play a boss rush shooter, and the other is inside the boss, using a smartphone to defend himself and attack the shmup player in a "Clash Royal like"

history.text: We did this project during our studies, and I worked on it at full time during two months with a bigger team - we were ten, with three programers (including me). We did this game on Unity. I did a lot of gameplay, I learned a lot about Unity UI (the smarthpone app is a big UI), and I also learned about team managing, since I was working with two other programmer, and was their "lead" (mostly distributing work and refering to other specialties).
